name: Shinobi Rivals
description:
Shinobi Rivals is a local multiplayer brawler, where you and a friend play as two Shinobi Warriors, battling atop of unstable platforms, to prove just which one of you is the more powerful warrior! 

In order to achieve victory, you must drive your adversary off of the platforms. You can do this just by bumping into them. Be careful though! This technique is likely to send you flying too! Also beware of standing idle for too long, as these platforms are old, and unstable. They could collapse at any moment if you stand on them!

Your fight will take you from great Sakura Forests, to the Rooftops of Kyoto, and even deep into the mountains - as you and your friends wreak havoc across 9 stages!

Features:

  • 9 Stages
  • Keyboard & Controller Support
  • 2 Players on 1 Keyboard
  • A Custom Soundtrack

Controls:

Keyboard A:

  •  A/D -> Move
  •  Space -> Jump

Keyboard B:

  Left/Right -> Move

  •  L. Mouse -> Jump

Xbox Controllers:

  •  L. Stick -> move
  •  A Button -> Jump
